0101110000110100 0111010000101101 1 -> sum: 1101000001100010, cout: 0
1000110001110001 1011111010100101 1 -> sum: 0100101100010111, cout: 1

0001101111111111 0011000011100000 0 -> sum: 0100110011011111, cout: 0
0010100000011011 0110011011100101 0 -> sum: 1000111100000000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
